sen.j: 大送神社の大綱引き（おおおくりじんじゃのつなひき）とは、の綱引き祭。
sen.e: The O-tsunahiki of O-okuri-jinja Shrine is a tug-of-war festival held in Hioki, Yagi Town, Nantan City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 「の綱引き祭り」の前に、ウェブ上から「京都府南丹市八木町日置」という情報を補って訳出致しました。
sen.e: The O-tsunahiki of O-okuri-jinja Shrine is a tug-of-war festival held in Hioki, Yagi Town, Nantan City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The O-tsunahiki of O-okuri-jinja Shrine is a tug-of-war festival held in Hioki, Yagi Town, Nantan City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 京都府指定・登録文化財一覧無形民俗文化財無形民俗文化財に指定されている。
sen.e: This festival has been designated as an intangible folk cultural property of the list of cultural properties designated and registered by Kyoto Prefecture.
This festival has been designated an intangible folk cultural property of the list of cultural properties designated and registered by Kyoto Prefecture.
This festival has been designated an intangible folk cultural property of the list of cultural properties designated and registered by Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 古くから村に棲む大蛇退治の伝説に基づいて行われる神事。
sen.e: It is a divine rite carried out based on an extermination legend of a large snake which lived in the village from ancient time.
It is a divine rite carried out based on an extermination legend of a large snake which lived in the village from ancient time.
It is a divine rite carried out based on an extermination legend of a large snake which lived in the village from ancient time.

sen.j: 大蛇の目に見立てた的と大蛇に見立てた約14mの綱を使って行われる。
sen.e: The tug-of-war is performed using targets shaped like the eyes of the large snake and a 14 m long rope shaped like the body of the large snake.
The tug-of-war is performed using targets shaped like the eyes of the large snake and a 14 m long rope shaped like the body of the large snake.
The tug-of-war is performed using targets shaped like the eyes of the large snake and an about 14 m long rope shaped like the body of the large snake.
sen.cmt: aをan aboutに変更しました。
